title.en: Demon King of the Royal Class

altTitles.en: The Demon Prince Goes to the Academy

altTitles.es-la: El Principe Demonio va a la Academia

altTitles.ja: 魔王様は学園に行く

description.en:
Upon dying, the author of "The Demon King is Dead" is given two choices: go to hell or be reborn in his novel and survive till the end.

The problem? He's reborn as Baalier Junior, a weak demon prince, after his realm was conquered! To make things worse, his attempt to escape somehow gets him enrolled as a student of the Royal Class in Gradias Temple, a prestigious human school.

In the midst of plotlines and political schemes, can this author keep his identity a secret and reach a happy ending?

altTitles.en: How to train your brainrot girlfriend

altTitles.es-la: Tengo una novia con la percepción de la realidad alterada

altTitles.tl: Paano Sanayin ang Iyong Jowang Utakbulok

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái bại não của tôi

description.en: Brainrot Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: ひとりぼっちの異世界攻略

altTitles.zh: 孤單一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.zh-ro: Duzi Yi Ren De Yi Shijie Gonglüe

altTitles.zh-hk: 獨自一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.th: นายโดดเดี่ยวพิชิตต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Lonely Attack on the Different World

description.en:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
description.es-la: El fuerte no necesita trucos. Haruka, un estudiante de preparatoria quien gastó su vida como un "solitario", es convocado a otro mundo con sus compañeros de clases. Al ser convocado se encuentra con un "Dios", quien le da a escoger una habilidad, sin embargo... No era lo que esperaba encontrarse.
description.pt-br:
Exilado da classe? Checado  
  
Ser transportado para um mundo alternativo com seus colegas? Checado  
  
 Encontrar um Deus em uma espécie de Limbo entre os dois mundos? Checado  
  
 Pegar uma skill roubada? Não gostaria de ser você, já foram todas vendidas.  
  
 Essa história é sobre a aventura de um garoto solitário em um mundo alternativo, não agradecido a um Deus sênil que deu a ele todas as habilidades que não precisava.

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

altTitles.ja: 夢なし先生の進路指導

description.en: A former career consultant, Takanashi now works for a school as a Guidance Counselor. During career guidance meetings, he gives headstrong students data and tells them the realities of the world around them, hoping that they rethink their dreams. Because of that, students call him “Yumenashi” (“Dream Crusher”).

title.en: Gomi Ika da to Tsuihousareta Shounin, Jitsu wa Zensei Kenja Desu

altTitles.ja: ゴミ以下だと追放された使用人、実は前世賢者です
ゴミ以下だと追放された使用人、実は前世賢者です　～　史上最強の賢者、世界最高峰の学園に通う

altTitles.ja-ro: Gomiikadato Tsuihousareta shiyounin, Jitsuha zense kenjya desu
Gomi Ika da to Tsuihousareta Shounin, Jitsu wa Zensei Kenja Desu: Shijou Saikyou no Kenja, Sekai Saikou Hou no Gakuen ni Kayou

altTitles.en: The Servant Who Was Banished for Being Less Than Trash Is Actually a Sage in a Previous Life
The Servant Who Was Banished for Being Less Than Trash Is Actually a Sage in a Previous Life: The Most Powerful Sage in History Attends the World's Most Prestigious Academy

description.en:
One day, Gard, a servant of a count's family, was framed for a crime he did not commit and was fired from his job.

"You're worse than trash! Get out of this house immediately!"

Expelled from the Count's family and with nowhere to go, Gard saw a flyer recruiting students for Remillion Magic Academy and decided to take the entrance exam in the royal capital. It was said to be the most difficult exam to enter a magic academy, but Gard passed it with ease.

How could this happen to Gard, who was just a servant?!

Yes, in his previous life, Gard was actually the "strongest sage"!

The strongest sage is unrivaled! A thrilling reincarnation story!
description.ja:
伯爵家の使用人だったガルドは、ある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、「お前はゴミ以下だ！ すぐに家から出ていけ！」と、使用人を解雇されてしまう。

伯爵家から追放され、行く当てのないガルドは、レミリオン魔法学園の生徒募集チラシを目にし、王都で入学試験を受けることに。

最難関と言われる魔法学園の試験だったが、ガルドはその試験を軽々とパスしてしまう。

なぜ、単なる使用人だったガルドに、そんなことが――!?

そう、ガルドの前世は、なんと“最強の賢者”だったのだ！

最強賢者が無双する！ 痛快☆転生ストーリー!!

title.en: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji

altTitles.en: Previous Life was Sword Emperor. This Life is Trash Prince.

altTitles.ja-ro: Zensei wa Ken Mikado. Konjou Kuzu Ouji

altTitles.ja: 前世は剣帝。今生クズ王子

altTitles.zh-hk: 前世是劍帝。今生是渣王子

altTitles.pt-br: Na Minha Vida Anterior Eu Era o Imperador da Espada. Nesta vida sou um Príncipe Lixo.

altTitles.en: Sword Emperor Previous Life, Prince Trash This Life.

description.en:
He was called a Sword Emperor who lived for the sword and died by the sword. And his end was a tragedy. 

However, by strange coincidence, he was reincarnated as the third prince in a country. He was enjoying his lazy lifestyle away from swords and heroism. As a consequence, people began referring to him as Prince Trash.

He never cared about his derogatory name until one day, he encounters someone who gets the wheel of fate to move in motion.
description.pt-br: A espada, vivia pela espada e morria pela espada. Depois de dias e meses de batalha, o espadachim escolheu a morte por sua própria vontade, mas renasceu como Fai Hanse Diestburg, o terceiro príncipe do reino de Diestburg. Querendo se distanciar de sua vida passada, onde vivia como possuído pela espada, Fai decidiu levar uma vida perdulária, ganhando o apelido de “Príncipe Lixo”. No entanto, um dia, devido a um trato com a casa real de Afillis, o reino vizinho, Fai é enviado para a guerra, liderando tropas de reforço. No campo de batalha, Fai testemunha uma cena de desespero quando o “Herói”, uma existência com poder rivalizando com dezenas de milhares, varre o campo de batalha. Fai considerou retornar ao reino, mas a morte de um certo cavaleiro conseguiu abalar seu coração, então ele decidiu empunhar a espada mais uma vez – a lenda do príncipe preguiçoso mais forte começa!

altTitles.ja: 君の心を漢字たい

altTitles.id: Aku Ingin Menulis Hatimu ke Dalam Kanji

altTitles.en: I Want to Write Your Heart into Kanji

description.en: A high school boy, Yomi Hashiba, is troubled. He is unable to understand what Mizuki Hanai, a cool girl who became his girlfriend a month ago, is thinking... One day, while he is worrying about his relationship with Mizuki Hanai, he starts to understand her "Kanji"...? (same pronunciation as feeling) This is the beginning of a thrilling coming-of-age romantic comedy about love and kanji!
description.id: Seorang anak SMA, Yomi Hashiba, sedang bermasalah. Dia tidak dapat memahami apa yang dipikirkan Mizuki Hanai, seorang gadis keren yang menjadi pacarnya sebulan yang lalu... Suatu hari, ketika dia mengkhawatirkan hubungannya dengan Mizuki Hanai, dia mulai memahami "Kanji" -nya... ? (pengucapan yang sama dengan perasaan) Ini adalah awal dari komedi romantis dewasa yang mendebarkan tentang cinta dan kanji!
description.es-la: Un chico de preparatoria, Yomi Hashiba, está preocupado. No puede entender lo que está pensando Mizuki Hanai, una chica genial que se convirtió en su novia hace un mes... Un día, mientras se preocupa por su relación con Mizuki Hanai, comienza a entender su "Kanji"... ? (caracter/sentimiento) ¡Este es el comienzo de una emocionante comedia romántica sobre la mayoría de edad sobre el amor y los kanji!

altTitles.ja: 提督の怪物妻

altTitles.es-la: La monstruosa esposa del almirante

description.ar:
تسمى ليديا بلانانج بالوحش بسبب حراشفها.
 عوملت كقاصر وأجبرت على الزواج بأمر من الإمبراطور. خطيبها بحار متوحش وشرس.
 إنه أميرال تشيليا الذي يشاع أنه سادي للغاية.
 لكن عندما التقى بها لأول مرة ، كان لطيفًا معها بشكل لا يصدق ...؟
 "أمسك زوجي بيد زوجته وكان يصرخ بالفعل".
 تتعلم ليديا شيئًا فشيئًا عن سر تشيليا في حب الأدميرال الشديد.
 التنانين والأخطبوطات العملاقة وثعابين البحر والجنيات وحوريات البحر ...
 حب مقدّر بعد الزواج على المحيط الرائع!
 **
 "أعرف نبتة يمكن أن تساعد زوجي على زيادة قدرته على التحمل."
 انحنى الإسكندر وهمس في أذنها.
 "إذا لم تكن راضيًا الليلة الماضية ، فسأحاول العثور عليها."
 "... أوه لا!"
 ليلة أمس!
 احمر خجل ليديا حرفيا لأنها تتذكر أسرارها التي لا يمكنها إخبار أي شخص.
description.en:
Lydia Planang is called a monster because of her scales. She was treated like a minor and forced to marry by the order of the emperor. Her fiancé is a wild and fierce sailor. He is the admiral of Chillia, who is rumored to be very sadistic. But when he first met her, he was incredibly nice to her…?

"My husband just grabbed his wife's hand and he was already screaming."

Lydia learns little by little about Chillia's secret in the admiral's intense love. Dragons, giant octopuses, sea snakes, fairies and mermaids… A destined love after marriage on the splendid ocean!

**

"I know a plant that can help my husband increase his stamina."

Alexander leaned over and whispered in her ear, "If you weren't satisfied last night, I'll try to find it."

"…Oh no!" Last night! Lydia literally blushed as she recalled her secrets that she couldn’t tell anyone.

---
They call her a monster... but to this admiral, she's a sacred descendant of the sea! Rudia Flang has been mistreated her whole life, so when the emperor arranges her marriage to Alexander Cilia, war hero and the youngest admiral in history, she cowers in fear at the thought of marrying a violent seaman. As this ocean voyage treks on, she's met with benevolence from the Sercilian Island people who, unbeknownst to her, find the scales glistening on her body far from the marking of a monster...

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58318624)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-admirals-monstrous-wife/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97119)
description.fr:
Lydia Plang a été appelée un monstre à cause de ses écailles. Elle a été traitée comme une sous-humaine et a été forcée de se marier par ordre de l'empereur. Son fiancé est un marin tropical sauvage et féroce. C'est un amiral de Chilia, dont on dit qu'il est atroce.

Mais il la rencontre pour la première fois et se montre étonnamment gentil avec elle...?

"Le mari a juste tenu la main de sa femme et cela l'a fait crier."

Lydia apprend peu à peu le secret de Chilia dans l'amour intense de l'amiral.

Dragons, krakens, serpents de mer, nymphes et sirènes, amour fatidique après le pré-mariage dans la belle mer! Un fantasme de romance marine unique qui n'a jamais été vu auparavant par un artiste calligraphe.

**

"Je connais une plante qui aide à l'endurance de mon mari."

Puis Alexandre se pencha et lui chuchota à l'oreille.

"Si vous n'avez pas aimé hier soir, je vais le trouver et l'essayer."
"…Oh non!"

La nuit dernière! Des choses trop secrètes pour être racontées à qui que ce soit venaient à l'esprit, et Lydia rougit.
description.ko:
태어날 때부터 몸 곳곳에 비늘이 돋아 괴물이라 불리던 플랑 후작 가문의 영애 '루디아 플랑'.

그녀는 황제의 명으로 거칠고 사납기로 유명한 뱃사람, 칠리아 제독과 결혼하게 된다.

그런데 처음 만난 그는 의외로 상냥하기만 한데...?

환상적인 바다에서 펼쳐지는 선결혼 후연애 운명적 사랑!
description.ru: Лидию Плананг называли чудовищем из-за ее чешуи. С ней обращались как с недочеловеком, и по приказу императора она была вынуждена выйти замуж. Ее жених - дикий и свирепый тропический моряк. Он адмирал Килии и по слухам просто ужасен. Однако, при первой же встрече он неожиданно оказывается к ней добр…?
description.tr: Lydia Planang, pulları nedeniyle canavar olarak adlandırıldı. Alt insan muamelesi gördü ve imparatorun emriyle evlenmeye zorlandı. Nişanlısı vahşi ve vahşi bir tropikal denizcidir. Acımasız olduğu söylenen Chilia'nın bir amirali. Ancak, onunla ilk kez karşılaştığında ve beklenmedik bir şekilde ona karşı nazik davrandığında? Evlilik öncesi, Evlilik sonrası ve güzel denizde ortaya çıkan kader aşkı.

altTitles.es-la: Puerta Fantasmal

description.en:
After staying behind in the office to work overtime, Giyoon accidentally spots Director Jung Yitae masturbating in the empty office. Disturbed by the immoral sight, he tries to leave. But an unknown force draws him closer to the man he does not get along with. After resolving to take a video of the director's unpleasant acts, the director catches him in the act and turns the situation against him.

But, is this person really Director Jung Yitae?

A dark and twisted relationship begins.
description.es: Después de quedarse en la oficina para trabajar horas extras, Giyoon accidentalmente ve al director Jung Yitae masturbándose en la oficina vacía. Perturbado por tal visión inmoral, intenta marcharse. Pero una fuerza desconocida lo acerca al hombre con el que no se lleva bien. Después de decidirse a grabar un vídeo de los actos desagradables del director, éste le pilla en el acto y vuelve la situación contra él. Pero, ¿es esta persona realmente el director Jung Yitae? Comienza una relación oscura y retorcida.

title.en: Ore ni Trauma wo Ataeta Joshi-tachi ga Chirachira Mitekuru kedo, Zannen desu ga Teokure desu

altTitles.ja: 俺にトラウマを与えた女子達がチラチラ見てくるけど、残念ですが手遅れです

altTitles.en: The Girls Who Traumatized Me Keep Glancing at Me, but Alas, It’s Too Late

altTitles.es-la: Las chicas que me traumaron me están mirando, pero desafortunadamente es demasiado tarde.

description.en: Kokonoe Yukito has always been unlucky when it comes to women. He was rejected by his childhood friend, which he thought they had mutual feelings for each other. He sister hates him. His mother neglected him— Due to all these trauma stacking with each other, his emotions were completely destroyed. When Yukito enters high school, the girls who inflicted these pain on him started to care for him...?! Thus commence a youthful Romcom full of misunderstandings!
description.ja: 九重雪兎は昔から女運が悪い。両想いだと思っていた幼馴染にはフラれ、姉には嫌われ、母親には疎まれ――度重なるトラウマの果てに感情がぶっ壊れてしまう。そんな雪兎が高校に入学したら、彼にトラウマを与えてきた女子達がやたらと彼のことを気にかけてきて……!?　手遅れから始まる勘違い思春期ラブコメ、開幕！
description.es-la:
Yukito Kokonoe siempre ha tenido mala suerte. Es odiado por su madre, su hermana, y su amiga de la infancia, pensaba que tenían sentimientos mutuos, pero ella se siente frustrada antes de la confesión, e incluso hace travesuras durante sus heridas, y sus emociones se rompen después de repetidos traumas con muchas mujeres.

Sin embargo, cuando ingresó a la escuela preparatoria, ¿¡Las chicas que lo traumatizaron comenzaron a preocuparse por él ...!?
Esta es una comedia romántica de un adolescente incomprendido que comienza demasiado tarde.

altTitles.en: The Young Lady With the Black Soul

altTitles.ja: 公爵家の黒幕令嬢

description.en:
Born as an illegitimate child to the duchy, Estelle became the saint of the empire.

She spent her entire life trying to love everyone around her, but being betrayed and sacrificed to the devil, Estelle suffered in hell for 600 years.

[Do you desire revenge?]

[If you wish, I’ll send you back to their brightest moment. What do you think?]

The whispers from the devil reached her ears.

Holding the devil’s hand, Estelle came back from hell.

As the lady of the Garnet Duchy, the greatest family in the entire Empire.
To bring cruel destruction to all who betrayed her.

“I’ll steal everything from my enemies and make them meet their worst endings possible.”

40 years ago, three mysterious seeds fell to Earth, unleashing countless monsters. Chosen beings arose to fight against these monsters. Those who manifested the powers of this world's heroic spirits into weapons or blessings were called heroes.

Min Jae-ha, who aspired to become a hero, wandered the front lines but couldn't achieve his dream. Giving up hope of becoming a hero, he now works at That’s Real Company.

One day, while investigating a mineral dungeon for work, Min Jae-ha steps on a mysterious summoning circle and unexpectedly gains an extraordinary heroic spirit, one he had always dreamt of contracting with.

However...

"How many times must I tell you? I am alive!"

"Aren't you technically neither dead nor alive?"
"So what can you even do inside my belly?"

Why has this extraordinary heroic spirit taken residence in Min Jae-ha’s belly instead of manifesting as a weapon or blessing?

"Look up to me, and I shall teach you martial arts."

title.en: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.ja: 薫る花は凛と咲く

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja: #薫る花

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

altTitles.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

altTitles.es-la: Noche de Duendes

description.en:
“The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.”

altTitles.de: Die Tagebücher der Apothekerin - Geheimnisse am Kaiserhof

altTitles.th: สืบคดีปริศนา หมอยาตำรับโคมแดง เล่ม

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと

description.de: Maomao ist eine unscheinbare Dienerin am Kaiserlichen kaiserlichen Hof. Zumindest bemüht sie sich, so gesehen zu werden. Denn seit sie in den Dienst des Kaisers verkauft wurde, hat die junge Apothekerin alles darangesetzt, ihre Schuld abzuarbeiten, ohne weiteres Aufsehen zu erregen, damit sie bald nach Hause zurückkehren kann. Aber Maomao ist schlau – und viel zu neugierig. Als die Kronprinzen einer nach dem anderen einem mysteriösen „Fluch“ erliegen, mischt sie sich heimlich ein, um das Rätsel zu lösen. Dabei erregt sie die Aufmerksamkeit des Eunuchen Jinshi – und eh sie sichs versieht, wird sie mitten in die Intrigen am Kaiserhof hineingezogen…
description.en: Maomao, a young woman trained in the art of herbal medicine, is forced to work as a lowly servant in the inner palace. Though she yearns for life outside its perfumed halls, she isn’t long for a life of drudgery! Using her wits to break a “curse” afflicting the imperial heirs, Maomao attracts the attentions of the handsome eunuch Jinshi and is promoted to attendant food taster. But Jinshi has other plans for the erstwhile apothecary, and soon Maomao is back to brewing potions and…solving mysteries?!
description.fr:
À 17 ans, Mao Mao a une vie compliquée. Formée dès son jeune âge par un apothicaire du quartier des plaisirs, elle se retrouve enlevée et vendue comme servante dans le quartier des femmes du palais impérial! Entouré de hauts murs, il est coupé du monde extérieur. Afin de survivre dans cette prison de luxe grouillant de complots et de basses manœuvres, la jeune fille tente de cacher ses connaissances pour se fondre dans la masse.

Mais, quand les morts suspectes de princes nouveau-nés mettent la cour en émoi, sa passion pour les poisons prend le dessus. Elle observe, enquête… et trouve la solution! En voulant bien faire, la voilà repérée… Jinshi, haut fonctionnaire aussi beau que calculateur, devine son talent et la promeut goûteuse personnelle d’une des favorites de l’empereur. Au beau milieu de ce nid de serpents, le moindre faux pas peut lui être fatal!

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.id: Diculik dan dijual ke harem, Maomao berusaha bertahan dengan kemampuannya beradaptasi. Wawasan yang luas tentang obat-obatan membuat karirnya melompat tinggi, langsung menjadi pelayan pribadi selir kesayangan kaisar!
description.it:
Maomao, una giovane farmacista del quartiere a luci rosse della capitale, viene venduta suo malgrado come sguattera alla corte imperiale. Anche se desidera ardentemente tornare libera, si ritrova a non disdegnare la vita tutto sommato comoda che è riuscita a ritagliarsi a palazzo, dove, senza farsi notare, riesce a proseguire i suoi studi di fitoterapia e sulla preparazione dei veleni. Di fronte a un male che affligge i figli dell’imperatore, Maomao sente tuttavia di farsi avanti e, sfruttando le sue conoscenze, riesce a salvare loro la vita. La ragazza attira così le attenzioni del bel eunuco Jinshi, che ha in mente per lei dei piani ben precisi.

---
Giovani donne vengono spesso vendute per lavorare per un breve periodo nell'harem dell'imperatore. È questo il caso di Maomao, farmacista presso il quartiere a luci rosse. Non ha alcun interesse nel farsi notare a palazzo e preferisce starsene per conto suo a preparare medicine, studiare veleni o fare esperimenti su se stessa. Ma quando a corte si diffonde la voce che i figli dell'imperatore sono destinati a una morte prematura, Maomao non riesce a rimanere indifferente. Mentre cerca di indagare, cattura l'attenzione di misterioso e affascinante ufficiale di alto rango. Ha così inizio la sua particolare carriera.
description.ja:
宮中に名探偵誕生!?

「小説家になろう」発! 
ヒーロー文庫の大人気タイトル『薬屋のひとりごと』が、待望のコミカライズ! 
中世の宮中で下働きをする少女・猫猫(マオマオ)。
花街で薬師をやっていた彼女が、帝の御子たちが皆短命であるこという噂を聞いてしまったところから、物語は動き始める。
持ち前の好奇心と知識欲に突き動かされ、興味本位でその原因を調べ始める猫猫の運命は――…!?
「小説家になろう」は株式会社ヒナプロジェクトの登録商標です。
description.pl: Maomao, ambitna młoda zielarka, zostaje porwana i trafia do haremu cesarza jako służąca. Aby nie pogarszać sytuacji, w której się znalazła, zataja swoje umiejętności, a nawet fakt, że potrafi czytać i pisać. Tymczasem nowo narodzone dzieci władcy umierają na skutek tajemniczej klątwy. Zielarka szybko orientuje się, że to nie magia, ale trucizna jest przyczyną śmierci niemowląt. Decyduje się ostrzec księżniczki, podrzucając do ich komnat wiadomość o powodach niezwykłej choroby ich dzieci. Dziewczyna nie przypuszcza nawet, jak bardzo ta decyzja zaważy na jej losie. Tym bardziej, że znalazła się w miejscu, w którym nikt nie może czuć się bezpieczny...
description.ru:
В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?! Адаптация одноимённого ранобэ.  


---

- Won the Grand Prize in the Printed Manga category at the Tsugi ni Kuru Manga Award 2019.  


---

description.th:
ณ อาณาจักรใหญ่ยักษ์แห่งหนึ่งซึ่งตั้งอยู่ใจกลางทวีป เด็กสาวนางหนึ่งผู้ทำงานเป็นหมอยาในสถานเริงรมย์ย่านโคมแดงอันมีนามว่า ‘เมาเมา’ บัดนี้เกิดจับพลัดจับผลูต้องมาทำงานรับใช้อยู่ในวังหลัง

เธอทำได้เพียงเฝ้ารอให้หมดวาระการทำงานอย่างสงบเสงี่ยมเจียมตัว ด้วยรูปร่างหน้าตาที่ไม่สะสวยจึงมั่นใจเป็นนักหนาว่าตนจะไม่มีวันโดนจักรพรรดิเรียกไปเป็น ‘คู่นอน’ อย่างแน่แท้

แต่ในขณะนั้นเอง โอรสธิดาของจักรพรรดิกลับมีเหตุให้อายุสั้น
พอรู้ว่าสองทารกน้อยที่ยังเหลือรอดกำลังป่วยหนัก เมาเมาจึงลงมือขุดคุ้ยหาสาเหตุ—
description.uk: Ще зовсым юна Мамао досліджує мистецтво лікування травами, мріючи відкрити ліки від усіх недуг. Однак проти своєї волі вона потрапляє в імператорський гарем як служниця. Вона вирішує приховати набуті знання, тому прикидається однією з багатьох неписьменних дівчат. Тим часом діти правителя гинуть за загадкових обставин. Коли весь двір говорить про таємниче прокляття, Маомао розпізнає симптоми отруєння. Але як застерегти зневірених матерів від небезпеки, коли в оточенні імператора голос простого слуги нічого не означає? За воротами Внутрішнього палацу будь-якої миті може статися чергова трагедія. Чи знайде Маомао своє місце в цьому світі, повному інтриг?
description.vi:
Miêu Miêu là một cô gái làm công việc hầu hạ trong cung đình thời phong kiến.
Câu chuyện của chúng ta bắt đầu với việc cô gái từng hành nghề dược sư ở phố hoa này nghe thấy người ta đồn thổi rằng: tất cả những đứa con của Hoàng đế đều đoản mệnh.
Bị thúc đẩy bởi niềm khát khao tri thức và tính hiếu kì cố hữu, Miêu Miêu bắt tay vào tìm hiểu nguyên nhân, xem đó như một cách giải khuây không hơn không kém.
description.zh-hk: 時值中世紀，位處大陸中央的某個大國，有位姑娘名喚貓貓，原本在煙花巷擔任藥師，現在則在後宮當下女。其間，貓貓無意間聽說皇子皆年幼早夭的傳聞，並得知連尚在人世的皇子皇女也身染重病，她於是開始調查其病因──廣獲讚譽的酣暢淋漓推理之作，眾所期盼的第一集終於出版。以中世紀東方為舞臺，「試毒」少女將一一解決宮中發生的懸疑案件！

title.en: Shoukan sareta Kenja wa Isekai wo Yuku ~Saikyou nano wa Fuyou Zaiko no Item deshita~

altTitles.ja: 召喚された賢者は異世界を往く ～最強なのは不要在庫のアイテムでした～

altTitles.en: A Sage Is Summoned to Another World: The Undesired Items Are Now the Strongest

altTitles.es-la: El sabio es invocado a otro mundo ~Los artículos más fuertes eran los menos deseados del inventario~

altTitles.ko: 소환된 현자는 이세계를 누빈다 ~최강인 것은 필요없는 재고 아이템이었습니다~

altTitles.zh-hk: 被召喚的賢者前往異世界～廢棄庫存道具才是最強～

altTitles.zh: 被召唤的贤者前往异世界～废弃库存道具才是最强～

description.en:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---
description.es-la:
Touya, el jugador mas fuerte del juego Pandemic World Online, ha ganado tantos items que decidió crear una cuenta alternativa para almacenarlos, mientras jugaba fue invocado a otro mundo, pero al no tener la categoría de héroe es desechado y remplazado por otra persona, ahora tendrá que sobrevivir solo en ese mundo y con el personaje que creó para almacenar esos objetos.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9275ei/) (Japanese)

title.en: Sono Bisque Doll wa Koi o Suru

altTitles.ja: その着せ替え人形は恋をする

altTitles.es-la: Esa muñeca de porcelana está enamorada

altTitles.th: หนุ่มเย็บผ้ากับสาวนักคอสเพลย์

altTitles.vi: Cô Nàng Nổi Loạn X Chàng Thợ May
Nàng Búp Bê Thử Đồ Của Tôi Biết Yêu

altTitles.ja-ro: Sono Bisque Doll ha Koi wo Suru

altTitles.en: The Bisque doll is falling in love

description.en: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

title.en: The Obsessive Second Male Lead Has Gone Wild

altTitles.es: El Segundo Protagonista Obsesivo Se Ha Vuelto Loco

altTitles.es-la: El Obsesivo Segundo Protagonista se ha Vuelto Loco

description.en:
I remember the story of a novel I had read in my previous life just before my marriage. If you don’t mess up the wedding, you’ll be poisoned by your husband! So I just kissed the priest who was in charge of the ceremony.

"Commander, are you alright?" 
One of the holy knights shouted as he approached the priest who was kissed. Huh, what? Wait... are you the commander of the Holy Knights?

**

Rurutia, who was about to die, wanted to spend her last moment in a temple where she felt at ease the most. She started a business with her friends for the temple, and itwas a big hit.

"Miss, you have the world in the palm of your hands!"

"Are you a God who descended to earth?"

In the midst of being embarrassed by the large crown, the commander of the holy knights himself was also acting strange.

“All I wish for is to be your husband,” he said that with eyes shining with obsession, "Take responsibility for stealing my first kiss."

This is all so wrong. It seems that I changed my future.
description.es: ‘Lurutier’, la hija de la familia Brucke en el Imperio de Oriente. Un día, Lurutier, quien fue abusada por su padre como víctima de un experimento mágico para resucitar a su madre muerta, aprende sobre el futuro en la encrucijada de la vida y la muerte. “¡No puedo morir así!” Para cambiar el futuro de ser vendida a un viejo conde y morir, Lurutier besa la cabeza de los Caballeros Sagrados, Cainzel, quien oficia en el salón de bodas.
description.fr:
Je me souviens de l'histoire d'un roman que j'avais lu dans ma vie précédente, juste avant mon mariage. Si tu ne gâches pas le mariage, tu seras empoisonnée par ton mari! Alors j'ai embrassé le prêtre qui était chargé de la cérémonie.

«Commandant, vous allez bien?» cria l'un des chevaliers sacrés en s'approchant du prêtre que je venais d'embrasser. Hein, comment? Attendez… vous êtes le commandant des chevaliers sacrés? Rurutia, qui était sur le point de mourir, voulait passer ses derniers moments dans un temple où elle se sentait en toute tranquillité. Avec ses amis, elle a monté une affaire pour le temple, et c'était un grand succès.

«Mademoiselle, vous avez le monde dans la paume de vos mains!»

«Êtes-vous un Dieu descendu sur terre?»

Au milieu de la gêne occasionnée par la grande couronne, le commandant des chevaliers sacrés lui-même se comportait étrangement.

«Tout ce que je souhaite, c'est d'être ton mari,» dit-il avec des yeux brillants d'obsession, «Assumes la responsabilité d'avoir volé mon premier baiser.»

Tout cela semble tellement faux. On dirait que j'ai changé mon avenir.

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Majo, Hajimemashita ~Watashi Dake "Kouryaku Saito" o Miseru Sekai de Jiyuu ni Ikimasu~

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の魔女、始めました ～私だけ『攻略サイト』を見れる世界で自由に生きます～

altTitles.en: I Became the World's Strongest Witch: I Will Live Freely in a World Where Only I can Access the "Guide Site"
The World's Strongest Witch Has Begun - I Will Live Freely In A World Where Only I Can View The "Strategy Site" -

description.en:
An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!
description.ja:
「…攻略うぃき？」――最弱クラスのスキルを発現してしまい追放された少女・ローナ。しかしそのスキルの正体は、この世界の『攻略サイト』を見ることができるＳＳＳランクのチートスキル【インターネット】だった！

（１）冒険開始→（２）即・最強武器発見→（３）世界を混乱に陥れる最強少女に‥‥‥。ローナは言う。「私はただ、平和に自由に生きたいだけなのにいぃ‥‥‥！」

title.en: I'll Resign and Have a Fresh Start in This World

altTitles.en: I'm Going To Relax in This World After Submitting My Resignation
Resigning and Healing in Another World

description.en:
The main character, Cho Isu, lived an ordinary but happy life.
Five years ago, he suddenly loses his parents, and becomes a devastated man, as he struggles every day.
When he was exhausted from the suffocating daily life, a portal opened in the room. A place he has never been to, a place he doesn’t know what might be.
A healing life to enjoy in a different world starting as a commoner and turning into a feudal lord.

title.en: The Goal Is to Be Self-Made

altTitles.en: My Goal Is to Achieve Success on My Own
The Goal Is to Become Self-Sufficient

altTitles.es: El Objetivo es Lograrlo por mi Cuenta

description.en:
“Your Grace the Duke, please marry me.” 

When I woke up, I was in a game world. But the problem is that I became a supporting character that was to be sacrificed to break the hard mode. There is only one way out of this situation. Marry the Eastern Grand Duke Sedrick Etzel, avoid a predetermined death, quickly earn a lot of money and become self-made! I have a more cooperative contract husband than I thought. Exceeding the goal seems to be completely possible! Here comes the player, lay down the money path!
description.es: "Su Gracia el Duque, por favor cásese conmigo". Cuando me desperté, estaba en un mundo de juegos. Pero el problema es que me convertí en un personaje secundario que debía ser sacrificado para pasar el modo difícil. Sólo hay una forma de salir de esta situación. ¡Cásate con el Gran Duque del Este Sedrick Etzel, evita una muerte predeterminada, gana mucho dinero rápidamente y hazlo por tu cuenta! [!] Habilidades de artesanía (nivel legendario/nivel oculto) [!] ¡Bajo la influencia de tus habilidades, grandes ideas te vienen a la cabeza! [!] ¡Comencemos a crear! Afortunadamente, las habilidades de nivel oculto existen solo para mí, “Es mi trabajo, pero gracias por preocuparte tanto”. “También es mi trabajo. Tú mismo lo dijiste, un Etzel nunca siempre devuelve el favor. Así que siempre debes acercarte a mí”. Tengo un marido por contrato más cooperativo de lo que pensaba. ¡Superar la meta parece ser completamente posible! ¡Aquí viene el jugador, establece el camino del dinero!
description.pt-br: Ela era uma garota que vivia presa em uma cama de hospital quando descobre um jogo de estratégia e sobrevivência diferente de todos os outros, o que não esperava era... Ela acordou como uma personagem que é usada e logo depois morre?! Não é isso que Violet Hales quer.

description.en: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.

title.en: I Picked a Hammer to Save the World

description.en:
If the name Tiny brings to mind a diminutive rogue befitting the name, think again: Tiny is a headstrong, muscle-bound warrior who would rather smash his way through obstacles with his trusty warhammer than use his brain. 

When Tiny and the legendary Ten Knights of Asran are defeated by the Demon Beastlord Gluttony, he is given a second chance at life as he is magically sent back to the past. 

Relying on his knowledge of the future, the young Tiny must right the wrongs of the past and prepare for the upcoming battle!

altTitles.es-la: El Dios de la Batalla de la Academia de Cazadores

description.en:
With an F-rank Trait, deemed the worst of the worst, 5-year-old Shin Yu-sung is abandoned by the Shin-oh family, which is famous for raising hunters.

The same year, he meets one of the strongest hunters, the Fist King, at the orphanage and is adopted by him. The Fist King became the strongest not through his Trait or special abilities — but by training his body.

He takes note of Shin Yu-sung's physique instead of his Trait — nine blocked yin pathways.

“Your blocked pathways cause your body’s mana to overflow, giving you an exceptional mind and god-like looks! But you also pass away before coming of age…”

An abundance of bodily yang.

“Your body is overflowing with the energy that can cure your nine blocked yin pathways!”

altTitles.en: Chronicles of the Martial God's Return

altTitles.ja: 武神帰還録

altTitles.es-la: Crónicas del Regreso del Dios marcial

altTitles.pt-br: Crônicas do Retorno do Deus Marcial

description.en:
The worst talent that no one can compete with. Unstoppable Demon God, Dan Uhyeon.

A thousand years after being sealed for the misdeed. A thousand years was enough to get rid of Dan Uhyeon's sense of superiority. A world that has changed, solitude with no one knows, and the only thing left is despondency and emptiness.

"Time goes like the wind. There's really nothing left."

A little girl who appeared in front of Dan Uhyeon lost her purpose and will to live aimlessly, Hwa Somi. For a girl who seems to have nowhere to lean on, Dan Uhyeon feels the same and gradually begins to open the door of his mind.

"I'm Dan Uhyeon. Come with me."

The story of a warrior with an icy heart and acute and pure girl The story of an unusual family's life in the midfield will warm your heart.

---
The Ultimate Martial Divine Demon, Dan Woohyun, was sealed up because he was too strong for the world to handle.  After a millennium passed by, he was released from his seal and felt like everything was meaningless as he wandered the back alleys… 

Just as he fell down because he was sick of the world, a small hand appeared in front of him.

"What's this?" asked Dan Woohyun. 

"A dumpling!" came a reply. 

This was the first time in his life that someone had been nice to him without any impure intentions, and that changed his fate. This is the chronicle of a martial god who traversed through a thousand years of time and space!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%EB%A1%9D/2891), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59492385)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16060)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112858)
description.fr: Le sixième chef-d’œuvre du genre Wuxia qui comblera vos attentes, tout comme les [Chroniques du retour du troisième degré], [La conquête de la faction céleste] et les [Chroniques des sept dragons et des sept démons]. [Chroniques du retour du Dieu Martial] Le Démon Martial Divin Ultime, Dan Woohyun, a été enfermé car il était trop fort pour que le monde puisse le gérer. Après un millénaire, il a été libéré de son sceau et avait l’impression que tout n’avait pas de sens alors qu’il errait dans les ruelles… Au moment où il s’est écroulé parce qu’il en avait marre du monde, une petite main est apparue devant lui. « Qu’est-ce que c’est ? » a demandé Dan Woohyun. « Une boulette ! » lui a été répondu. C’était la première fois de sa vie que quelqu’un était gentil avec lui sans aucune intention impure, et cela a changé son destin. Voici les chroniques d’un dieu martial qui a traversé mille ans de temps et d’espace !
description.ko:
그 누구도 맞설 수 없는 최흉의 인재(人災),

무극신마, 단우현.

이대로 영원히 세상위에 군림할 줄 알았다.
중원의 질서를 지키는 팔선들에 의해 동정호에 봉인을 당하기 전까지는….

세월이 흘러 천 년 후.
천 년이라는 시간은 단우현에게서 살심을 없애기에 충분했다.
변해버린 세상, 아는 사람이라고는 아무도 없는 고독, 남은 것은 허탈함과 공허함 뿐.

“바람이 흐르듯 세월도 흐르는구나. 정말로 아무것도 남은 것이 없어.”

목적도, 삶의 의지도 잃고 정처없이 떠도는 단우현 앞에 나타난 자그마한 소녀. 화소미.
누구에게도 기댈 곳 없어 보이는 소녀에게 단우현은 동질감을 느끼며 점점 마음의 문을 열기 시작한다.

“나는 단우현이다. 나와 함께 가자꾸나.”

얼음장 같은 마음을 가진 무신과 귀엽고 순수한 소녀의
마음을 따뜻하게 녹여 줄 평범하지 않은 한 가족의 중원 생활 이야기.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lYB8b4SxrLo)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%EB%A1%9D/2891)
description.zh: 因嗜杀被封印千年的武神苏醒归来，这一世，他却只想安安静静的养女儿...
description.pt-br: Dono de um talento inigualável, Dan Woohyeon. Ele pensou que governaria o mundo eternamente, até que foi selado. Milhares de anos se passaram. O mundo mudou e as únicas coisas que restaram foram o desespero e o vazio. “À medida que o vento flui, o tempo também. Realmente não há mais nada.” Uma garotinha aparece na frente de Dan Woohyeon, que não perdeu o propósito nem a vontade de viver.  Dan Woohyeon sente-se unido com uma garota que parece não ter ninguém em quem se apoiar e gradualmente começa a abrir as portas do seu coração. “Meu nome é Dan Woohyeon. Quer vir comigo?” Começa a jornada de um deus marcial com um coração gelado e uma garota fofa e pura.

altTitles.en: A World Without My Sister Whom Everyone Loved
A World Without My Sister Who Everyone Loved
The World Where the Beloved Sister Disappeared

altTitles.es: El mundo en el que desapareció la amada hermana

altTitles.es-la: El mundo sin mi hermana a quien todos amaban

altTitles.ja: 愛され悪女が消えた世界

altTitles.zh: 备受宠爱的姐姐消失的世界

altTitles.zh-hk: 萬人迷姐姐消失的世界

altTitles.th: โลกที่ไร้พี่สาวผู้เป็นที่รัก

description.en:
"I hate you enough to want to kill you, Sienna."

I was my sister’s shadow all my life, and I was betrayed by her and died. But… people have changed since the day I came back in time.

"You're the only child Nacht chose."

"His Highness recognizes you as family."

Something's wrong. These people seem to mistake me for my older sister.

"I beg you, believe in us for once, that we care for you."

I once wanted to be loved. Now I fear that this mindset will become my weakness. One betrayal was enough. Everything is over when you bet everything in love. I just want to get my life back so…

---
After being taken in by the noble house of Nacht, Sienna grew up with her adopted sister, Lorena, who she believed to be the sweetest, kindest person in the world. But after Lorena attempts to kill her, Sienna realizes how much her "loving" sister actually hated her. She tries to end her life with a magic potion but ends up going back in time instead. Determined to survive, she tries to use her memories to her advantage. For some strange reason though... Lorena is now nowhere to be found.
description.es: Te odio lo suficiente como para querer matarte, Sienna. Ella fue la sombra de su hermana toda su vida y fue traicionada por ella. Lo único que podía elegir era mi propia muerte. “Lo siento hermana, no podré conceder tu deseo de matarme”. Por cierto… Las personas de la mansión Natch que regresaron en el tiempo son diferentes a las de antes. “Eres la única niña que ha elegido el Gran duque”. “Su Alteza lo reconoce como miembro de su familia”. Algo está mal. Es como si estas personas me confundieran con mi hermana mayor. “Te lo estoy diciendo créeme solo una vez. Nosotros nos preocupamos por ti”. Una vez quise ser amado. Ahora tengo miedo de que ese corazón se convierta en una debilidad. Una traición fue suficiente para quitarme la vida. Se acabó el tiempo de apostar todo al amor. Sólo quiero recuperar mi vida. ‘Si no amo, ya no me lastimarán’. “Ahora es tiempo de ir por caminos separados”.
description.fr: Accueillie au sein de la froide maison Nacht, Sienna y fait la rencontre de Loreina et trouve en elle une sœur de fortune…Une sœur rassurante qui fait tourner son triste monde… Une sœur qui, pourtant, dans l’ombre, lui voue une haine tenace et tente un jour de l’assassiner. Encore sous le choc, Sienna fait un retour dans le passé et, à sa grande surprise, ne trouve aucune trace de la traîtresse… L'occasion unique de savoir à quoi ressemble une vie sans Loreina… Et si son absence était une délivrance?
description.id: "Aku membencimu sampai-sampai aku ingin membunuhmu, Sienna." Aku hidup di bawah bayangan kakak tiriku yang dicintai semua orang. Akhirnya aku memutuskan untuk mengakhiri hidupku sendiri setelah dikhianati kakakku. Tapi... aku malah kembali hidup di dunia ini, dan perlakuan orang-orang juga berubah. "Kamu adalah anak pilihan Nacht." "Yang mulia Grand Duke Nacht sudah menganggap anda seperti keluarga." Ada yang tidak beres. Sepertinya orang-orang mengira kalau aku adalah kakakku. Dulu aku memang ingin dicintai. Tapi aku takut keinginan ini menjadi kelemahanku. Cukup sekali saja aku dikhianati. Aku hanya ingin menjalani hidupku sendiri!
description.es-la: Te odio lo suficiente como para querer matarte, Sienna. Ella fue la sombra de su hermana toda su vida y fue traicionada por ella. Lo único que podía elegir era mi propia muerte. “Lo siento hermana, no podré conceder tu deseo de matarme”. Por cierto… Las personas de la mansión Natch que regresaron en el tiempo son diferentes a las de antes. “Eres la única niña que ha elegido el Gran duque”. “Su Alteza lo reconoce como miembro de su familia”. Algo está mal. Es como si estas personas me confundieran con mi hermana mayor. “Te lo estoy diciendo créeme solo una vez. Nosotros nos preocupamos por ti”. Una vez quise ser amado. Ahora tengo miedo de que ese corazón se convierta en una debilidad. Una traición fue suficiente para quitarme la vida. Se acabó el tiempo de apostar todo al amor. Sólo quiero recuperar mi vida. ‘Si no amo, ya no me lastimarán’. “Ahora es tiempo de ir por caminos separados”.

altTitles.ja: 暴食妃の剣

description.en:
After Dean, a third rate adventurer, got surrounded by demonic beasts in the demonic labyrinth, he fled to a place where he found the strongest demon who devours power: The demon-fed sword Belzera, born to the Gluttony Empress Belzebuth. After obtaining such unexpected power, he once again aims to become a first rate adventurer he looked up to, and delves deeper into the labyrinth. However…  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054913513847) (Japanese)

The 72 Demon Kings, who received the order to destroy the earth, each went through a trial by the Great Demon King Astrea. Those who passed the trial earned the title of Demon King, and each Demon King was granted special powers by the Great Demon King.

So far, each Demon King had been granted extraordinary abilities. When Karos became a Demon King, he received a power from the Great Demon King, but… 

“Great Demon King, no matter how much I think about it, there is a problem with my power.”
“Problem?”

Among the Demon Kings with extraordinary abilities… Karos received the [Gacha] ability. 

“Gacha as the power of a Demon King? How am I supposed to rule the world with Gacha?!'”

title.en: The Monster Duke Mistook Me for His Wife

altTitles.en: The Monster Duke Mistakes Me for His Wife

altTitles.es-la: El Monstruoso Duque Me Confundió Con Su Esposa

description.es-la: El 'Duque Monstruoso' que está maldito y una figura oscura, Dillian Sinaize apareció ante mis ojos. “¿Quién diablos le hizo esto?” Está muriendo. No podía fingir que no lo había visto, así que lo traté. “¿No solo ha perdido la memoria, sino que también tiene extrañas ilusiones?” “Cuando te veo, mi corazón late tan rápido y mi mente se marea.” "Bueno eso es…" "Como era de esperar, éramos amantes.” “¡¿No, no nos conocíamos?!” Una vez que comenzó el malentendido todo se salió de control. "Si mi esposa me deja..." "¿No crees que podría matarte?" "No, tienes que matar al tipo que te secuestró". De este hombre aterrador… ¿Podré escapar…?

altTitles.ja: Kisu Shite Kurenakya Shinjau

altTitles.en: Your Kiss is the Only Medicine

altTitles.ja: キスしてくれなきゃ死んじゃう

description.en: Yuuta Sato accidentally discovers that childhood friend Rinko Uenohara contracted a very rare illness called the "Kissing Disease". The disease forces the person to kiss someone of the opposite sex at regular intervals or die! Yuuta decides that he is going to keep her alive no matter what. Will he succeed? What will the others think when they find out about the two!?

Youour Highness- That is absurd!!

"Youour Highness, did you just cough-!!!"

"It's doomed! I've been transmigrated to another world! As an extra chambermaid from a 19+ imperovished novel from the early 2000s!"

For now, I'm trying my best not to upset the male lead's temper so I can survive and return home...

"Youour Highness! Please have mercy!"
"Youour Highness! That is such an absurd thing to say!"
"Could you please stop with that damn antiquated language?!"
Seems like the etiquette here is a bit different from what I know...

Anyway, after defeating an assassin and taking an arrow for him, I feel like I've become somewhat closer to the male lead.

The ominous journal that seems to understand my words, and the male lead, who orders me around, seems a bit fishy too.

"Can I survive here and return home?"

title.en: Ten to Chi to Hazama no Sekai Yelatium

altTitles.en: Yeratium - The World Between Heaven And Earth

altTitles.ja: 天と地と狭間の世界イェラティアム

description.en:
The long-awaited comicalisation of the Another world x Battle fantasy from the novel! 

Heaven, where gods dwell. On earth, where demons dwell. And people live in the world in between. There were seven floating continents. When a continent falls, demons appear and become stronger and when a continent rises, no demons appear and one can enjoy a moment of peace and tranquility. The Wheel of Fortune,given by the gods, is responsible for a continent’s levitation. After 2,000 years, the Wheel of Fortune begins to change. The time for inevitable destruction, One boy soars through the space between heaven and earth on blue wings…..

Eight years ago, Zuo Fan's Warrior father was arrested for deserting his post when a huge monster tide swept through S City. Zuo Fan is determined to clear his father's name and save him from his death sentence, but that's easier said than done when he's a low-level Warrior hated for being a traitor's son.

However, things take a surprising turn when he's betrayed by his party and left to die in a monster lair. Thanks to the sudden activation of a mysterious warrior system, Zuo Fan's lethal wounds are healed and his fighting skills are boosted. Not long after he escapes danger, he also learns that the truth behind what happened at S City is hidden within a dangerous restricted area teeming with high-level monsters.

It's up to Zuo Fan to tango with fish lizards and level up so he can get to the bottom of the truth once and for all!

title.en: The Marquis and the Iron Wall Lady

altTitles.es-la: El marqués corrupto y la dama de hierro

altTitles.es: EL MARQUÉS Y LA DAMA DEL MURO DE HIERRO

altTitles.es-la: ¡¿Dónde está mi martillo?!

description.en:
Alpheus, the Marquis of Lothian and master of Silverglen Castle, is considered the perfect man with a brilliant mind and a handsome face. However, rumour has it that he suffers from a mysterious disease and always wears gloves.

His finance secretary Edith has been working for the marquis for years when he suddenly asks her to act as his fake fiancée. He seems to need an excuse to refuse the many marriage proposals offered to him, but what exactly is his plan that he strangely acts incredibly sincere in this contract relationship? The longer she pretends to be his fiancée, the more confused Edith becomes...

A cold-blooded noble and a lady with a defence as strong as an iron wall - the beginning of a workplace romance that starts with a contract!
description.es: El Marqués Alpheus Rhodian, un hombre con una notoria inteligencia y una apariencia perfecta. Sin embargo, se rumorea que siempre usa guantes debido a su condición. Edith, trabaja como tesorera de un hombre tan atractivo como el Marqués. Pero, ¡¿por qué debe ella entre todos fingir ser la prometida falsa del Marqués solo para que este pueda rechazar una propuesta que no le agrada?! ¿Cuál es el verdadero sentimiento de ese extraño hombre que inició una relación por contrato? Cuanto más finge ser su prometida, más confundida se siente Edith... ¡La combinación de un hombre de aspecto frío con una dama con una defensa semejante a la de un muro de hierro, ¡por la que nadie puede pasar desapercibido! ¡El comienzo de un romance de trabajo que inicia por medio de un contrato!

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

title.en: Josou shite Off-Kai ni Sanka shite mita.

altTitles.en: I (♂) Cross-Dressed for the IRL (♀) Meetup

altTitles.ja: 女装してオフ会に参加してみた。

description.en: “Cocoa” has made three best friends in her online game, and she’s excited to meet them in real life at a dessert café for the first time. The only problem: She’s actually a man who’s been lying to them. What begins as a tense manga about online life quickly turns into a lighthearted comedy about friendship, gender, and forgiving yourself and others. [Kodansha]

title.en: The Bad Ending of an Otome

altTitles.en: The Bad Ending of the Otome Game

altTitles.zh: 那个乙女游戏的坏结局

altTitles.en: The Bad Ending of an Otome Game

altTitles.es-la: El Mal Final Del Juego Otome

description.en:
The game's heroine had a limited time to live. Meanwhile, I played the role of the villainous friend that vies for the male leads' attention before being eliminated by the player. However, after that kid died, I made the decison on my own to exit from this story.

But, what do I do? The reactions of those around me are a bit strange.

"I came to the marquess’s estate because Ophelia needed a friend around her age. And now, Ophelia's dead."

Their gaze seemed to be asking me why I was stating the obvious.
I said it plainly.

"So, I should leave now."

For some reason, the two men made an expression as if they were at a loss for words.
They used to consider me a fly that stuck to Ophelia's side, so why?

*Otome Game: A game targeted towards women where the protagonist (player) is female
description.es: Reencarné en el juego otome que había jugado en mi vida anterior. Ofelia, una hermosa protagonista femenina como una diosa, es amada por numerosos nobles, mientras que Emilia, el personaje en el que reencarné, tiene un papel secundario de villana y sigue a los protagonistas masculinos después de la muerte de Ofelia, solo para ser destruida por ellos. Unos años después de que Ofelia muere debido a una enfermedad incurable, aparece el jugador (nombre predeterminado Elodi) que se parece a Ofelia. Los objetivos masculinos del amor, que estaban desconsolados por la pérdida de Ofelia, se obsesionan con Elodi. Yo, que reencarné en la historia y me convertí en Emilia, decidí abandonar ese tipo de trama. Entonces, decidí dejar tranquilamente el lugar en el que había vivido durante 10 años el día del funeral de Ofelia. Nadie esperaba que ella se fuera y se sorprendieron. Siguieron buscándola que había desaparecido sin una sola palabra, pero no pudo encontrarla. Dos años después, un encuentro accidental los lleva a encontrarla.
description.ko:
오토메 게임 속
시한부 여주인공의 친구이자,
남주인공들에게 퇴치 당하는 악역,
'에밀리아'에 빙의했다. 

하지만 상관없다.
여주인공 '오필리아'는
내게 친구이자, 가족, 세계 그 자체였으니까.

"모두 날 잊어도 너는 나를 잊으면 안 돼."

그녀가 죽은 늦봄,
나는 후작가를 떠났다. 

…그런데, 어째 주변의 반응이 좀 이상하다. 

"후작가를 나가면 사는 게 쉽지 않을 텐데요."
"제가 당신의 카발리에가 되겠습니다."
"가지 마라, 에밀리아. 후작가로 돌아와다오."

다들 왜 이래?
오필리아를 사랑했던 사람들이 
내게 다정히 굴 리 없을 텐데...?

주인공이 사라진 후 남겨진 사람들의 이야기 
<그 오토메 게임의 배드엔딩>

title.en: I Became My Son's First Love

description.en: In order to support her older sister, Eve Jenna, the beautiful second daughter of a poor countryside baron, agreed to marry Count Hound. Despite his age, Count Hound holds the title of being the empire's most handsome man, a rich and powerful playboy with numerous women on each arm - and thus only interested in a lady of the house and not someone to warm his bed. He already had numerous children, the oldest of which is even a year older than Eve, so no need to bear him an heir either. So, for 3 years, the two had a harmonious marriage as partners who hardly interferre with each other's private lives, until the Count suddenly requests a divorce. Naturally, as he is the one to break their contract first and thus has to pay out compensation, Eve is happy to agree...

The martial arts master Chu Wenshan has lost his memories, but the only clue to finding out about himself is a threatening letter… Huh? My brother was kidnapped? Wait, who’s my brother? No, even if I don’t know, I have to rescue him. Excuse me my friend, have you seen my brother?

altTitles.ja: アフタースクールメイト

description.en: Family, friends, himself... Rika is frustrated by his inability to gain understanding of the gender difference between his body and mind, and one day he gets into a fight with his mother and runs away from home. There he meets Satsuki, a boy who can share his feelings of not being understood... The two meet and confront the issues they have been running away from... A coming-of-age drama that questions "individuality"!

title.en: 8th Loop for the Win! With Seven Lives’ Worth of XP and the Third Princess’s Appraisal Skill, My Behemoth and I Are Unstoppable!

altTitles.ja-ro: Loop 8-shume wa Shiawase na Jinsei wo: 7-Shuubun no Keikenchi to Daisan Oujo no "Kantei" de Kakusei shita Ore wa, Aibo no Behemoth to Tomo ni Musou suru
ループ8周目は幸せな人生を ～7周分の経験値と第三王女の『鑑定』で覚醒した俺は、相棒のベヒーモスとともに無双する～

description.en:
This is a story about Remille, an adventurer who died. Specifically, he’s died a lot — seven times now, always at the hands of vicious monsters.

Every time, though, he’s returned to the same day, three years prior. He’s tried everything at this point, from sword fighting to magical arts to beast taming, but it always ends the same way. Is there any hope for him in this 8th loop of his life?

Perhaps a chance encounter with Princess Ciel might change things? Her magical eye can see all possible futures—and with Remille’s vast stores of XP from seven lives of adventuring, just about anything is possible!

Add in the fact that his erstwhile feline friend Catra isn’t exactly what she seems (and how the princess herself wants to party up with him) and this 8th loop might just be the charm!

altTitles.es-la: El mago prodigio devorador de medicina

description.en:
Renoc was supposed to be a video game character, so giving him a dying body in exchange for extreme magical prowess felt reasonable. However, when his creator wakes up inside Renoc's body, it doesn't feel like a game anymore!

His life in the game is unbearable until he discovers the mysterious drug Vyper, which gives him the strength to wield his magic to its full potential.

As Renoc walks a fine line with the drug that could save or destroy him, can he find a way to survive in this new world?
description.pt-br:
"World", um jogo que esbanja extrema liberdade.

Na "versão 3.0", eu decidi colocar tudo o que tinha para aumentar o talento de magia!

Todos os atributos que possuo são sobre magia!

Aumentar o talento de magia do personagem fez com que ele tivesse diversas características negativas. Mas isso não importa. Vou criar o mago mais poderoso, mesmo que o personagem pareça um cadáver.

Mas... o que é isso? Eu me tornei o personagem -

 um personagem com talento incrível, mas que não pode passar um dia sem seus remédios.

title.en: The Legend of Heroes VI: Trails of Cold Steel

altTitles.ja: 英雄伝説 閃の軌跡

altTitles.zh: 英雄傳說 閃之軌跡

description.en:
In the warmongering nation of Erebonia lies Thors Military Academy, a premier institution attended by both the nobility and the common folk alike. Rean Schwarzer, a new first year, learns that he, along with eight students of wildly different backgrounds, have been selected for the experimental Class VII - a new class in which the established social hierarchies are not recognized. But tensions are high in the Empire, and Rean and his new classmates may soon find themselves embroiled in conflicts far beyond those of the classroom.  
  
Based on the game Eiyuu Densetsu - Sen no Kiseki (The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel) by Nihon Falcom.
That was the boy I loved, accompanying me through verdant days and brilliant, fleeting years.

altTitles.es-la: El Mago infinito

description.en:
This is the tale of a boy dreaming about infinity as a human!

Found abandoned in a stable, Shirone is the son of a hunter—and a peasant through and through.
Despite hardships, he's a genius that manages to learn to read by himself and becomes obsessed with it.

Brimming with genius talent, he goes to the city with his father, where he learns about magic—
beginning his journey as an explosive rising star!

altTitles.ru: Величайший в истории младший сын маркиза

altTitles.en: Legendary Youngest Son of the Marquis House
The Margravial Household's Phenomenal Youngest Son

altTitles.es-la: El legendario hijo menor de la casa del marqués

description.en:
After getting revenge on the Thulcaan Empire, Jack Valantier took his last breath. But just when he thinks it's all over, he finds himself transported back to when he was 14!

From his negligent and wicked family to his loyal servant and caring sister, it's all just as he had remembered. But this time, Jack is armed to the teeth with decades of experience from his previous life! He's ready to give them hell, and those that have wronged him will pay dearly.

Because this time, he's invincible.
description.ja: 名望ある侯爵家の末息子、ジャック・バレンティエ。 他人よりも冷たい家族の中で唯一頼れたのは姉だけだった。 一家が滅びようと未練はなかったが、姉の死が無駄な犠牲だったとわかってから、復讐だけが目的の剣鬼となった。 遂に西大陸を支配するトゥルカン帝国を倒し戦場の怪物となった時、目の前に迫った死を謙虚に受け止める… ところが!! 14歳の過去に人生回帰！ そうだ、これは後悔だらけだった過去をやり直すチャンスだ。 今世ではもう二度と、大切な人たちを失ったりはしない！
description.ko:
명망있는 후작가의 막내아들 잭 발란티에.
남들 보다 못한 가족들 사이에서 유일하게 의지했던 건 누나 뿐!
가문 따위야 멸문을 하든 말든 미련이 없었지만,
누나의 죽음이 헛된 희생인 걸 알게 된 후,
오로지 복수만을 위한 검귀가 되었다.
마침내 서대륙을 지배하는
돌칸 제국을 무너뜨리고, 시산혈해 위의 괴물이 되었을 땐,
다가온 죽음을 겸허히 받아 들였다.

그런데!

14살, 과거로 돌아왔다!
그래, 이건 후회뿐이던 과거를 바로 잡을 기회다.
이번 생엔 두 번 다시 내 사람들을 잃지 않겠다!

후작가의 역대급 막내아들의 통쾌한 회귀 스토리가 시작된다!!
description.pt-br:
Eu vim para cá apenas com o objetivo de vingança. Eu derrubei o Império Tulkan, uma única nação que dominava o continente. Eu sempre consegui obter a vitória. Eu tinha realizado tudo o que precisava e estava satisfeito. É por isso que aceitei minha morte que se aproximava. Eu não tinha mais uma razão para viver. E assim meu coração parou de bater. Eu definitivamente senti isso parar. No entanto, o que aconteceu no mundo? "Não é magia negra e também não parece uma ilusão." Um menino com cabelos curtos e pretos foi refletido no espelho. Eu parecia exatamente como quando eu tinha 14 anos, que foi há 20 anos. 

Um menino, que ainda não perdeu a gordura do bebê, acariciou suas bochechas e murmurou: "Como isso é possível?". Eu tinha voltado. Ao tempo cheio dos meus arrependimentos.

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.zh-ro: Sanguozhi Qunxiongzhuan: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

altTitles.zh-hk: 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原

altTitles.ja: 火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!
